---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /staking/polkadot/undelegate/get-flow-status-done
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/6c37da8a-4b69-44db-b0df-6fb9af75f24b' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `withdraw_tx_broadcasting` to `done`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {4}
{
  "id": "6c37da8a-4b69-44db-b0df-6fb9af75f24b",
  "operation": "unstaking",

    "chill_transaction": {
```

### Undelegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, your stake is deactivated and withdrawn!
